sentence.Network_en: Immediately upon arriving, Prince Albert II planted the Monegasque flag, then the Olympic flag.
sentence.Network_cn: 到达北极点后,他立刻竖起了摩纳哥国旗和奥林匹克五环旗.

sentence.Network_en: Language: French is the official language , while Monegasque , Italian and English are also spoken.
sentence.Network_cn: 语言: 官方语言为法语.此外还通用意大利语、英语和摩纳哥方言.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...nistan（阿富汗）去掉istan五个字母而来，摩纳哥人的英语形式（Monegasque）是由Monaco（摩纳哥）变o为a再加sque四个字母 …

list.abs: moneda 莫内达, monegasques 摩纳哥人, moneda 风景园林

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Monaco
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Monaco or its people
